Articles.Content:
My Minmus station has Dermin Kerman in the command pod, and the lander I was docking with it was flown by Kermon Kerman. I didn't even notice the names until I had them together at the station. I've had other cool ones but these two are the best I've seen in a while.

Any funny or interesting names or combinations of names you guys have noticed?
I used Richdorf on an asteroid mission yesterday. I tend to look for funny names, then throw a Chad or Tom in there to keep em straight.
I got a Billy-Bobzer Kerman. At first I thought there had been a horrible accident with Bill and Bob.

I have a Jim Kerman, he's cool!

I also have a Kirbin Kerman, he is my fave

Billy-Bobby Kerman really fun

but the best was : it took random kerbals for a standard mun mission : 4 of them.

3 went down on the mun in the lander.

1 took the rover.

after 50km, I found an easter egg : when I right click on the Kerbal to plant a flag.... "Munman Kerman"
I have a Charlie, Jack, Chad and Luke Kerman. They are my best Kerbals

One time, in my career save, i saw a kerbal named Bartwise Kerman.

But in reality, he wasn't so wise.
Spaecial agent Kirrim Kerman for the win!
I'm vaguely disappointed I never got Dildo Kerman in the short window before the name was blacklisted...
Isn't there a Gene Kerman in the tutorials? I got a kick out of that one.

Munbus Kerman.

He's been the "driver" on all of my manned missions so far, though I haven't sent a bus to the Mun yet.

Munwise Kerman.

Wasn't so wise, though.

Wow! I love these names you guys are finding! XD I can't stop laughing about some of them!

I successfully flew a flight with Corbal and Dobal Kerman today. Well at least it landed in one piece. It was supposed to reach orbit but didn't.

I did select their names off the roster this time, though it's still kind of interesting that they were there together. Maybe I will start pairing up kerbals with like names from now on.

I think my favorite from here is Munbus. You've really got to make a MÃƒÂ¼n bus now.

Edited April 24, 2014 by thereaverofdarkness

Halsey Kerman

Too stupid to be alive, good pilot, Better Kerbal.

Im still trying to get another Halsey on my actual save, I really miss him...

James T. Kerman.....well it was James Kerman but with a bit of fiddling I go him to be a Captain!

Bobfurt Kerman is my other favorite one, he tests all my new, and sometimes dangerous, ideas.
I like Chad kerman He reminds me of Thad From Blue Mountain State if only phonically.
Two words: kirk kerman

Herman Kerman

I once had a Scott Kerman with the Badass-Syndrom.

Edited April 24, 2014 by Spanier
I got a Doodler Kerman once.
I got Obzor, Ludnard, Billy-bobley. Hilarious!

I once got Munwise, Munlas and Munby Kerman and took them to the MÃƒÂ¼n. They're stranded and, since I don't feel like planning and executing a 3-man rescue, I'm gonna throw a 4-men crew container at them and call it Munar base

What about the guy a few spots down from him?

A guy with a speech impediment who had a big night out.

"Man, I'm completely Raysted..."

What about the guy a few spots down from him?

A guy with a speech impediment who had a big night out.

"Man, I'm completely Raysted..."

Left my girlfriend wondering why I suddenly laughed while we were on the phone
Chuck kerman because he can burn ants with a magnifying glass AT NIGHT
